section.heading: Definition of product for agreement purposes

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.32 > Section 82.32.023 82.32.020 << 82.32.023 >> 82.32.026 PDF RCW 82.32.023 Definition of product for agreement purposes. For purposes of construing those provisions of the streamlined sales and use tax agreement that have been incorporated into this title, and unless the context requires otherwise, the terms "product" and "products" refer to tangible personal property, digital goods, digital codes, digital automated services, other services, extended warranties, and anything else that can be sold or used. [ 2009 c 535 s 1112 ; 2007 c 6 s 104 .] NOTES: Intent — Construction — 2009 c 535: See notes following RCW 82.04.192 . Part headings not law — Savings — Effective date — Severability — 2007 c 6: See notes following RCW 82.32.020 . Findings — Intent — 2007 c 6: See note following RCW 82.14.390 .
